body_html:
Our bazel upgrade to 0.4.5 and related configure script upgrades are done.
I just tried using nvidia dockers centos7 image, and I was able to build without problems.

I will close the issue now, but @dchirikov could you also verify by checking out the master branch, and using bazel 0.4.5?
If it still misbehaves as you described, we can reopen.

body:
Our bazel upgrade to 0.4.5 and related configure script upgrades are done.
I just tried using nvidia dockers centos7 image, and I was able to build without problems.

I will close the issue now, but @dchirikov could you also verify by checking out the master branch, and using bazel 0.4.5?
If it still misbehaves as you described, we can reopen.
